r.d: Zip is an extension to create, modify and read zip files.
r.n: - Add ZIPARCHIVE::OVERWRITE mode for ::open(), creates a new archive and write over an existing file - locateName do not change anymore the state, it can now be used to test an entry - fix possilbe crashes when two entries with the same name have been added - Enhanced safemode support - fix builds against php 6.0 (HEAD) - fix compiler warning (Ilia, Tony) - cleanup phpinfo() output (Ilia)
